languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, разгильдяи с авгурной команды передают, что мы достигли системы Нолла Септум с прометийдобывающим ульем Гордость Санти… Вашу ж мать да на Золотом Троне три раза!" {n}Передача прерывается, а спустя несколько секунд вновь слышится щелчок.{/n} "Император сохрани, Лорд-капитан, в системе темно, как у {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}грокса{/g} в заднице! Местная звезда, она того… Нет ее!"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, разгельдяи с авгурной команды передают, что мы того, достигли системы Нолла Септум с прометийдобывающим ульем Гордость Санти... Что за? Вашу ж мать да на Золотом троне три раза!" {n}Передача прерывается, а спустя несколько секунд вновь слышится щелчок.{/n} "Император сохрани, Лорд-капитан, в системе темно, как у грокса в заднице! Местная звезда, она того... Пропала!"

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum System where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Cap'n, the entire system's darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, разгильдяи с авгурной команды передают, что мы достигли системы Нолла Септум с прометийдобывающим ульем Гордость Санти… Вашу ж мать да на Золотом Троне три раза!" {n}Передача прерывается, а спустя несколько секунд вновь слышится щелчок.{/n} "Император сохрани, Лорд-капитан, в системе темно, как у {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}грокса{/g} в заднице! Местная звезда, она того… Нет ее!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum system where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Captain, the entire system is darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"

"Lord Captain, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we kind of reached the Nolla Septum system where a promethium-refining hive Santiel's Pride is loca... What the? Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Captain, the entire system is darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it is... kind of... gone!"

The local star, it's... it's not there!"

"Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum System where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Cap'n, the entire system's darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, ces bons à rien de l'équipe des augures me signalent que nous avons atteint le système de Nolla Septum, dont l'une des planètes, la Gloire de Santiel, abrite une ruche de raffinage du prom... Ma grand-tante sur le Trône d'Or ! » {n}La transmission s'interrompt brutalement, avant de reprendre quelques instants plus tard dans un cliquetis sonore.{/n} « L'Empereur nous préserve, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Il fait plus noir que dans le cul d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}, ici ! L'étoile du système, elle a comme qui dirait... disparu ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum System where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Cap'n, the entire system's darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, ces bons à rien de l'équipe des augures me signalent que nous avons atteint le système de Nolla Septum, dont l'une des planètes, la Gloire de Santiel, abrite une ruche de raffinage du prom... Ma grand-tante sur le Trône d'Or ! » {n}La transmission s'interrompt brutalement, avant de reprendre quelques instants plus tard dans un cliquetis sonore.{/n} « L'Empereur nous préserve, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Il fait plus noir que dans le cul d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}, ici ! L'étoile du système, elle a comme qui dirait... disparu ! »

languages.text: “船长老大，俄歇矩阵班组那帮饭桶报告说，我们已经到达了诺拉隔带星系。那里有个专门提炼钷素的巢都，叫桑提尔之傲，位于……卧……卧槽？真他妈日了黄金王座了！”{n}通讯戛然而止。片刻之后，随着一声响亮的“咔哒”声，通讯再次恢复。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑，船长老大！整个星系比{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}的腚眼子还黑！这里的恒星，它……没了！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum System where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Cap'n, the entire system's darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，俄歇矩阵班组那帮饭桶报告说，我们已经到达了诺拉隔带星系。那里有个专门提炼钷素的巢都，叫桑提尔之傲，位于……卧……卧槽？真他妈日了黄金王座了！”{n}通讯戛然而止。片刻之后，随着一声响亮的“咔哒”声，通讯再次恢复。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑，船长老大！整个星系比{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}的腚眼子还黑！这里的恒星，它……没了！”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Taugenichtse von Auguren melden, dass wir das System Nolla Septum erreicht haben, in der sich Santiels Stolz befindet, eine Makropole, auf der Promethium raffiniert w- Da beug doch einer meine Mutter über den Goldenen Thron!" {n}Die Übertragung endet abrupt und wird wenige Augenblicke später mit einem lauten Klick wieder fortgesetzt.{/n} "Der Imperator bewahre uns, Lord Captain, das ganze System ist dunkler als das Arschloch eines {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}! Der örtliche Stern, er ist ... er ist nicht da!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum System where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Cap'n, the entire system's darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Taugenichtse von Auguren melden, dass wir das System Nolla Septum erreicht haben, in der sich Santiels Stolz befindet, eine Makropole, auf der Promethium raffiniert w- Da beug doch einer meine Mutter über den Goldenen Thron!" {n}Die Übertragung endet abrupt und wird wenige Augenblicke später mit einem lauten Klick wieder fortgesetzt.{/n} "Der Imperator bewahre uns, Lord Captain, das ganze System ist dunkler als das Arschloch eines {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}! Der örtliche Stern, er ist ... er ist nicht da!"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los gandules del equipo de augures nos informan de que hemos llegado al sistema Nolla Septum, ubicación de Orgullo de Santiel, una colmena de refinado de promet... ¡Por el santísimo Trono Dorado!». {n}De repente, la transmisión se interrumpe y se reanuda con un fuerte clic varios minutos después.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos guarde, Lord Capitán, ¡este sistema está más oscuro que el interior del culo de un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}! Su estrella, no... ¡no está!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum System where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Cap'n, the entire system's darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los gandules del equipo de augures nos informan de que hemos llegado al sistema Nolla Septum, ubicación de Orgullo de Santiel, una colmena de refinado de promet... ¡Por el santísimo Trono Dorado!». {n}De repente, la transmisión se interrumpe y se reanuda con un fuerte clic varios minutos después.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos guarde, Lord Capitán, ¡este sistema está más oscuro que el interior del culo de un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}! Su estrella, no... ¡no está!».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、オーガークルーの半人前達から、プロメチウム精製ハイヴ、サンティエル・プライドがあるノーラ・セプトゥム星系に到着したと報告がありま…これは一体どういうことだ！」{n}通信はブツリと切れて、しばらく経つと大きくカチリと音がして通信は戻った。{/n}「皇帝よ、お守りください。ロード・キャプテン、星系一体が{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}のケツの中より真っ暗です！周辺にあった星が…星が… なくなってます！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum System where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Cap'n, the entire system's darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、オーガークルーの半人前達から、プロメチウム精製ハイヴ、サンティエル・プライドがあるノーラ・セプトゥム星系に到着したと報告がありま…これは一体どういうことだ！」{n}通信はブツリと切れて、しばらく経つと大きくカチリと音がして通信は戻った。{/n}「皇帝よ、お守りください。ロード・キャプテン、星系一体が{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}のケツの中より真っ暗です！周辺にあった星が…星が… なくなってます！」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan... Alamet mürettebatındaki işe yaramazlar, içinde prometyum arıtma kovanı Santiel'in Gururu'nun da bulunduğu Nolla Septum sistemine ulaşıldığı... Nasıl yani? Altın Taht'ın anasının dini!" {n}İleti aniden sonlanıyor ve bir süre sonra gürültülü bir tıkırtıyla devam ediyor.{/n} "İmparator bizi esirgesin Lord Kaptan, sistem {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g} götünün içinden bile daha karanlık! Buranın yıldızı... Biraz... Yok olmuş!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ne'er-do-wells from the augur crew are reporting we've reached the Nolla Septum System where a promethium-refining hive, Santiel's Pride, is loca— Bend my mother over the Golden Throne!" {n}The transmission ends abruptly and resumes with a loud click several moments later.{/n} "Emperor preserve us, Lord Cap'n, the entire system's darker than the inside of a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}'s arse! The local star, it's... it's not there!"
